questionnaire.title: Ensure all configurations are made to the appropriate server profile
questionnaire.description: Production environments should utilize the production server profile. Development and test environments should choose the profile that best fits their needs.

questionnaire.title: Declare an Software authorization policy for deployed applications
questionnaire.description: When configuring your application specific security policy, you must declare one (or more) of the following authorization modules in the security domain <policy-module> element: org.Software.security.authorization.modules.DelegatingAuthorizationModule, org.Software.security.authorization.modules.JACCAuthorizationModule. A security domain does not explicitly require an authorization policy. If an authorization policy is not specified, the default Software-web-policy and Software-Software-policy authorization configured in Software-as/server/$PROFILE/deploy/security/security-policies-Software-beans.xml is used. If you do choose to specify an authorization policy, or create a custom deployment descriptor file with a valid authorization policy, these settings override the default settings in security-policies-Software-beans.xml.
